name: Doggo Garden Defense
description:
Hungry Critters are coming for your carrots, can you shoo them away in this casual yet strategic Tower Defense game?

DEFEND THE GARDEN


Play on 4 difficulties and earn over 20 Steam Achievements.
Earn 7 permanent upgrades through the Boneyard, by completing maps to earn Bones.

INFUSE THE DOGGOS


Upgrade your Doggos beyond their natural limits by stuffing them full of Kibble!
We don't recommend this in real life.

EXPLORE THE SEASONS


Complete 8 unique maps, themed after the four seasons.
Some maps offer more space than others, will you recruit many Doggos, or will you infuse a select few?

SHOO AWAY THE... GATLING SNAIL?


Who gave this guy gatling guns AND cool shades? That wasn't in the budget! We don't have a budget!!!
Venture through Hecc difficulty to shoo away the elusive Snailord.
He'll be fine, we promise. Very cool shades offer great protection from Doggos.
